metadata.description: Azure Datacenter location for the resources and primary route
Azure Datacenter location for the alternative route
Azure Datacenter location for the "On Prem" resources
Username for the admin account of the Virtual Machines
Password for the admin account of the Virtual Machines
Password for the Virtual Machine Admin User

True enables Accelerated Networking and False disabled it.  
Not all VM sizes support Accel Net (i.e. Standard_B2ms).  
I'd recommend Standard_D2s_v3 for a cheap VM that supports Accel Net.
VPN Shared Key used for authenticating VPN connections

DNS Zone to be hosted On Prem and with a forwarding rule on the DNS Private Resolver.
Must end with a period (.)
Example:
contoso.com.

An Array of Custom DNS Server IP Addresses.  Azure Wireserver will be used if left as an empty array [].
Example:
[10.0.0.4, 10.0.0.5]

Azure Datacenter location that the main resouces will be deployed to.
Name of the Azure Firewall within the vHub A
Sku name of the Azure Firewall.  Allowed values are Basic, Standard, and Premium
Name of the Azure Firewall Policy
Resource ID of the Azure Firewall Subnet.  Note: The subnet name must be "AzureFirewallSubnet
Resource ID of the Azure Firewall Management Subnet.  Note: The subnet name must be "AzureFirewallManagementSubnet
Name of the Virtual Machine

Size of the Virtual Machine
Examples:
B2ms - 2 Core 8GB Ram - Cannot use Accelerated Networking
D2as_v5 2 Core 8GB Ram - Uses Accelerated Networking
Admin Username for the Virtual Machine
Password for the Virtual Machine Admin User
Name of the Virtual Machines Network Interface
True enables Accelerated Networking and False disabled it.  Not all sizes support Accel Net
The Resource ID of the subnet to which the Network Interface will be assigned.

Location of the file to be ran while the Virtual Machine is being created.  Ensure that the path ends with a /
Example: https://example.com/scripts/

Name of the file to be ran while the Virtual Machine is being created
Example: WinServ2022_ConfigScript_General.ps1

'Command to execute while the Virtual Machine is being created.
Example:
'powershell.exe -ExecutionPolicy Unrestricted -File <file name.ps1>'
Adds a Public IP to the Network Interface of the Virtual Machine
Name of the Virtual Machines Network Interface
True enables Accelerated Networking and False disabled it.  Not all virtualMachine sizes support Accel Net
The Resource ID of the subnet to which the Network Interface will be assigned.
Adds a Public IP to the Network Interface of the Virtual Machine if true.
Azure Datacenter location that the main resouces will be deployed to.
Name of the Azure Bastion
Resource ID of the subnet the Azure Bastion will be placed in.  The name of the subnet must be "AzureBastionSubnet"
SKU of the Azure Bastion

Name of the Azure Bastion

SKU of the Azure Bastion

the location for resolver VNET and dns private resolver - Azure DNS Private Resolver available in specific region, refer the documenation to select the supported region for this deployment. For more information https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/dns/dns-private-resolver-overview#regional-availability
Resource ID of the Virtual Network to which the DNS Private resolver will be added.
Resource ID of the Subnet to which the DNS Private resolver Inbound Endpoint will be added.
Resource ID of the Subnet to which the DNS Private resolver Outbound Endpoint will be added.
name of the dns private resolver
name that will be used for the private resolver inbound endpoint
name that will be used for the private resolver outbound endpoint

the location for resolver VNET and dns private resolver - Azure DNS Private Resolver available in specific region, refer the documenation to select the supported region for this deployment. For more information https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/dns/dns-private-resolver-overview#regional-availability
Resource ID of the Virtual Network to which the DNS Private resolver's ruleset will be linked.
Resource ID of the Outbound Endpoint to be associated with the forwarding ruleset
Name of the forwarding ruleset.
the target domain name for the forwarding ruleset
